wikipedia_page.main: Mary Hoare (1744-1820) was an English painter. She was William Hoare's daughter and Prince Hoare's sister. The latter had a strong influence on her.

response: Hoare was born in Bath, the son of painter William Hoare and his wife. He was named 'Prince' after his father's brother, a sculptor. He studied art from an early age, and became well known as a painter of  portraits and historical scenes. His sister Mary Hoare was also a noted painter.
His son, Prince Hoare, achieved fame as a painter and dramatist. His daughter Mary Hoare was also a noted painter.
